task.summary: # Creates players collection and renders it. - Setup initial meteor project. - Added minimongo - Made a reactDOM.render call.
Creates players collection and renders it. - added a clic event to add players
Adds Delete Button - Added ability to removes the player from the collection - changed es5 functions to arrow functions

Converted to full React Components -Broke into 5 distint components:App, TitleBar, PlayerList, Player and AddPlayer. -Used main.js to load only the App Component . -Added propTypes to Playerlist, Player, TitleBar, and App
Added styles to TitleBar -imported Fourseven:scss from atmosphere -added css reset -applied wrapepr class to titlebar
Added styles to other components -created partials for other components -gave item padding and margin-bottom -centered everything
Added ranking and colors -Adds dynamic classes via string interpolation -Created scss variables and used darken css function
Removed all files to only have images for Readme
Removed all files to only have images for Readme

MESSAGE.value: # Creates players collection and renders it. - Setup initial meteor project. - Added minimongo - Made a reactDOM.render call.
Creates players collection and renders it. - added a clic event to add players
Adds Delete Button - Added ability to removes the player from the collection - changed es5 functions to arrow functions

Converted to full React Components -Broke into 5 distint components:App, TitleBar, PlayerList, Player and AddPlayer. -Used main.js to load only the App Component . -Added propTypes to Playerlist, Player, TitleBar, and App
Added styles to TitleBar -imported Fourseven:scss from atmosphere -added css reset -applied wrapepr class to titlebar
